definitions.definition: To cause to swerve from a straight course.
definitions.example: to curve a ball in pitching it

definitions.definition: To bend or turn gradually from a given direction.
definitions.example: the road curves to the right

definitions.definition: To grade on a curve (bell curve of a normal distribution).
definitions.example: The teacher will curve the test.

definitions.definition: To reject, to turn down romantic advances.
definitions.example: I was once curved three times by the same woman.

definitions.definition: A shape or motion that curves.
definitions.example: the curvings of a mountain road
